title: RAISA-007710 (RECOVERED DOCUMENT)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlightyear]]

[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Kalam&display=swap');

.page {
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    center no-repeat; 
    float: center;
   
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-clip: border-box;
    background-color: transparent;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top, gray 0%, #E4E4E4 8%);
    background-origin: padding-box;
    background-position: 0px 8px;
    background-repeat: repeat;
    background-size: 100% 20px;
    
    font-family: 'Kalam', cursive;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 130%;
    letter-spacing: 0.3px;
    color: #222222;
    border: solid 1px gray;
    padding: 11px 20px 20px 20px;
    margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px;

    box-shadow: 3px 3px 2px gray
    }

.page p {
    line-height: 20px;
    margin: 0;
}
[[/module]]

[[include info:start]]
**RAISA-007710:** "Ghost Story"
**Author:** [[*user MaliceAforethought]]
**Canon:** [[[ad-astra-per-aspera-hub|Ad Astra Per Aspera]]]
-----

[[=]]
**[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/maliceaf-author-ght More by this author]**
[[/=]]
[[include info:end]]

> **__RAISA FILE: RECOVERED DOCUMENT [NON-ANOMALOUS]__**
> **AUTHOR:** SCPF Staff Member Ronald Dupont
> **FILE CREATED:** ████-██-██
> **CURRENT PURVIEW:** SCPF Department of Spectral Phenomena
> 
> **NOTICE:** //The following document was recovered from Laboratory #2 at Site-14, following the death of the author (cause unknown at the time of writing). It is believed to relate to the [[[aiad-homescreen|Artificial Intelligence Applications Division]]], and [[[ad-astra-per-aspera-hub|PROJECT: LUMINAL]]] in particular.//

-----

**DOCUMENT FRONT:**

[[div class="page"]]

@@    @@//Three months ago we created a mind
designed to help us navigate the stars
The soul of an astronaut, wrought by human hands//
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
//Three weeks ago, we killed it//
@@@@
@@    @@//A power surge and a faulty fuse connector
We booted them up in the morning to find
@@        @@nothing//
@@@@
@@@@
@@    @@//And honestly
although it's hard to admit
I never felt too bad about it
I'm a poet, not a brain scientist
@@        @@(or a rocket surgeon)
I'm here because I devoted my life to emotion
and the study of the psyche//
@@@@
@@@@
@@    @@//When all is said and done
their death was an honest mistake
There was no malice
Just a little bit of carelessness
and some bad luck//
@@@@
@@@@

[[/div]]

-----

**DOCUMENT BACK:**

[[div class="page"]]
@@    @@//The AI's been copied 
and backed up 
and restored
There's duplicates running everywhere now
Not the same, of course
but close
@@    @@Does it make up for that one fatal accident?//
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@        @@//I think it does//
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
//But
It still doesn't change the fact that
@@    @@every night
in our old lab
broken servers flicker on
and scream//
@@@@
[[/div]]

-----
@@ @@

author: MaliceAforethought
